articles.title: Riot Games takes back League of Legends and TFT from Garena -- finally - ONE Esports
articles.description: League of Legends is finally returning to Riot Games in Southeast Asia starting in January 2023. It was published by Garena for the last 12 years.
articles.content:
Hey dad, longtime no see.Riot Games released their premier MOBA game League of Legends in October 2009. Back then, there was only one server located in California, USA.

articles.title: Why do women find it so hard to admit they need help, let alone ask for it? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Not being able to ask for help isn’t exclusive to women, but women play so many important roles that this can become detrimental to society, says CNA Women’s Hidayah Salamat.
articles.content: I never saw my grandmother ask for or accept help. Once or twice, she sent us out to get her loose cigarettes from the convenience store downstairs (things were very different in the early 90s) or bu… [+3167 chars]
